channel.title: Springer on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Springer on My New Hugo Site

item.title: World War II, Science and Springer Authors
item.description: Springer have just launched a web app that lets you search for locations of authors, AuthorMapper.Â They have done this by building an XML database with the citation metadata for all of their papers. You search for terms or authors and it will generate a google map with the locations for your search terms, or people. The site also has some other infoporn, including a histogram for authors published by year for your search term.
